com.basho.riak.client.api.convert

Class JSONConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.api.convert.Converter<T>
      • com.basho.riak.client.api.convert.JSONConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type to convert to/from

    public class JSONConverter<T>
extends Converter<T>
    The default Converter used when storing and fetching domain objects from Riak.

    This uses the Jackson JSON library to serialize / deserialize objects to JSON. The reulsting JSON is then stored in Riak.

    Author:
    Brian Roach

      • toDomain

        public T toDomain(BinaryValue value,
                  String contentType)
        Description copied from class: Converter
        Convert the value portion of a RiakObject to a domain object.

        Implementations override this method to convert the value contained in a RiakObject to an instance of a domain object.

        Specified by:
        toDomain in class Converter<T>
        Parameters:
        value - the value portion of a RiakObject to convert to a domain object
        contentType - The content type of the RiakObject
        Returns:
        a new instance of the domain object

      • fromDomain

        public Converter.ContentAndType fromDomain(T domainObject)
        Description copied from class: Converter
        Provide the value portion of a RiakObject from the domain object.

        Implementations override this method to provide the value portion of the RiakObject to be stored from the supplied domain object.

        Specified by:
        fromDomain in class Converter<T>
        Parameters:
        domainObject - the domain object.
        Returns:
        A BinaryValue to be stored in Riak
